item.title: Set by step guide for a free and easy way to set up a low maintenance blog
item.description: Introduction I always struggled with the following; when I find a solution for a certain problem and months down the line I run into a similar problem and try to remember how I solved the previous one. Cursing at myself: Why didn’t I write this down!? Like many other IT professionals I created a blog (years ago) to write those solutions down for myself and anyone who stumbles upon the blog.

item.title: About
item.description: Experience Jev Suchoi has extensive experience as among others a Solution Architect, Cloud Consultant, Security Consultant, Tech Lead, Infrastructure Engineer, DevOps Engineer and Developer. In his work for different organizations he has accumulated extensive knowledge of Azure, Azure Active Directory and Azure DevOps. With a developer background Jev is able to fully incorporate development principles when designing and implementing cloud solutions. Jev Suchoi is a firm believer in the following concepts & principles as these are key to unlocking the full potential of DevOps and a cloud-native approach.
